summary: This bill, the Improving Coordination of Agriculture Research and Data Act, aims to address climate change impacts on agriculture. It mandates the establishment of the Agriculture Climate Scientific Research Advisory Committee, tasked with advising the Secretary of Agriculture on research priorities, data collection, and technology transfer related to climate-smart agriculture. The bill also establishes a Rural Climate Alliance Network to facilitate data sharing, provide technical assistance, and promote climate change adaptation and mitigation strategies for rural communities and agricultural producers. A comprehensive report to Congress outlining climate mitigation needs and federal budget recommendations is also required.
